tasks.title: Setup Skool Community Platform Infrastructure
tasks.description: Initialize and configure the Skool community platform with defined tiers, onboarding flow, and community structure
tasks.details:
1. Create Skool account and configure admin settings
2. Set up membership tiers (Automator, Vibe Coder, SaaS Founder)
3. Design and implement onboarding workflow
4. Create channels for Weekly Wins, Monthly Challenges, and Member Showcase
5. Configure automation rules for member progression
6. Set up integration with payment processing for premium tier ($49/mo)
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test complete user registration flow
2. Verify tier permissions and access levels
3. Validate automated welcome sequences
4. Test payment processing integration
5. Conduct user acceptance testing with 5-10 beta members

subtasks.title: Create Skool Account and Initialize Community
subtasks.description: Sign up for a Skool account, start the free trial, and create a new community with a relevant name and branding.
subtasks.details: Register on Skool, choose a community name, upload profile and banner images, and set up initial branding elements.

subtasks.title: Configure Admin Settings and Permissions
subtasks.description: Set up admin roles, adjust privacy settings (public/private), and define posting permissions for members.
subtasks.details: Assign admin/moderator roles, configure who can post or interact, and set privacy level for the community.

subtasks.title: Define and Set Up Membership Tiers
subtasks.description: Create and configure membership tiers such as Automator, Vibe Coder, and SaaS Founder, including access levels.
subtasks.details: Establish tier names, descriptions, pricing (if applicable), and permissions for each tier.

subtasks.title: Integrate Payment Processing for Premium Tiers
subtasks.description: Connect payment processor and set up subscription plans for paid tiers (e.g., $49/mo premium).
subtasks.details: Link bank account, configure payment gateway, and define recurring payment options for premium members.

subtasks.title: Design and Implement Onboarding Workflow
subtasks.description: Create a step-by-step onboarding process for new members, including welcome messages and initial guidance.
subtasks.details: Draft onboarding emails/messages, set up automated welcome sequences, and provide orientation resources.

subtasks.title: Create Community Channels and Categories
subtasks.description: Set up channels for Weekly Wins, Monthly Challenges, Member Showcase, and other relevant discussion categories.
subtasks.details: Organize channels by topic, configure posting permissions, and ensure clear navigation for members.

subtasks.title: Configure Automation Rules for Member Progression
subtasks.description: Set up automation for member progression, such as gamification, level-ups, and access changes based on activity.
subtasks.details: Define triggers and actions for automation (e.g., unlock content after certain engagement), and test rule logic.

subtasks.title: Test User Registration and Onboarding Flow
subtasks.description: Simulate new user sign-up and onboarding to validate the workflow, messaging, and access provisioning.
subtasks.details: Register test accounts, follow onboarding steps, and verify that users receive correct information and access.

subtasks.title: Test Tier Permissions and Access Levels
subtasks.description: Verify that each membership tier has correct permissions and access to channels, content, and features.
subtasks.details: Use test accounts for each tier to confirm access restrictions and feature availability.

subtasks.title: Test Automated Welcome and Progression Sequences
subtasks.description: Ensure that automated messages and progression rules trigger as expected for new and active members.
subtasks.details: Trigger automation events with test accounts and confirm correct messaging and level changes.

subtasks.title: Test Payment Processing Integration
subtasks.description: Process test payments for premium tiers to validate payment gateway, subscription activation, and error handling.
subtasks.details: Use sandbox/test payment methods to simulate transactions and verify member upgrades and receipts.

subtasks.title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing with Beta Members
subtasks.description: Invite 5-10 beta users to test the full platform, gather feedback, and identify any issues across all workflows.
subtasks.details: Monitor beta user activity, collect feedback on usability, and document bugs or improvement areas.

tasks.title: Develop Landing Page with Webflow
tasks.description: Create main landing page showcasing the Vibe Academy, Cohort, and Coaching offerings with clear CTAs
tasks.details:
1. Design in Webflow using modern, clean aesthetic
2. Implement sections for:
   - Hero with main value proposition
   - Service tiers and pricing
   - Course curriculum preview
   - Testimonials section (prepared for future)
   - Lead magnet opt-in forms
3. Integrate with email marketing system
4. Setup analytics tracking
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Cross-browser testing
2. Mobile responsiveness validation
3. Form submission testing
4. Page load speed optimization
5. A/B testing setup for CTAs

subtasks.title: Define Landing Page Objectives and Target Audience
subtasks.description: Clarify the primary goals for the landing page (e.g., sign-ups, sales calls) and identify the target audience to ensure the design and messaging are aligned.
subtasks.details: Document the main value proposition, desired CTAs, and user personas. Align objectives with broader marketing strategies.

subtasks.title: Plan Content Structure and Section Layouts
subtasks.description: Outline the required sections (Hero, Service Tiers, Curriculum Preview, Testimonials, Lead Magnet Forms) and determine their order and content requirements.
subtasks.details: Create a wireframe or content map specifying the purpose and key elements of each section, ensuring logical flow and clarity.

subtasks.title: Design Visual Style and UI Elements
subtasks.description: Establish the visual identity, including color palette, typography, imagery, and UI components, ensuring a modern and clean aesthetic.
subtasks.details: Design mockups or style guides in Figma or directly in Webflow, referencing brand guidelines and accessibility best practices.

subtasks.title: Develop Landing Page Structure in Webflow
subtasks.description: Set up a new Webflow project or page, implement the overall layout, and build out the main sections using Webflow’s drag-and-drop tools.
subtasks.details: Use div blocks, containers, and responsive design features to create the Hero, Service Tiers, Curriculum Preview, Testimonials, and Lead Magnet Forms sections.

subtasks.title: Populate Content and Configure Section Functionality
subtasks.description: Add finalized copy, images, and interactive elements to each section, ensuring all CTAs and forms are functional.
subtasks.details: Insert text, images, and buttons; configure forms for lead capture; prepare testimonial section for future content.

subtasks.title: Integrate Third-Party Systems (Email Marketing & Analytics)
subtasks.description: Connect lead magnet forms to the email marketing system and set up analytics tracking for user interactions and conversions.
subtasks.details: Use Webflow integrations or embed custom code for email marketing (e.g., Mailchimp, ConvertKit) and analytics (e.g., Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel).

subtasks.title: Comprehensive Testing and Optimization
subtasks.description: Perform cross-browser and mobile responsiveness testing, validate form submissions, optimize page load speed, and set up A/B testing for CTAs.
subtasks.details: Test on major browsers and devices, check all forms and CTAs, use Webflow’s built-in tools and external services for speed and analytics, and configure A/B tests.

subtasks.title: Publish and Monitor Landing Page Performance
subtasks.description: Launch the landing page, monitor analytics, and gather feedback for ongoing improvements.
subtasks.details: Publish the page in Webflow, review analytics data, and collect user feedback to inform future iterations.

tasks.title: Create Vibe Coding Masterclass Foundation
tasks.description: Develop and record the first 5 modules of the flagship course covering Cursor setup and basic workflows
tasks.details:
1. Create detailed course outline
2. Setup professional recording environment
3. Record modules:
   - Cursor setup and configuration
   - Project navigation
   - Custom modes creation
   - Basic AI prompting
   - Project structure best practices
4. Edit and produce videos
5. Create accompanying resources and exercises
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Beta testing with 5 users
2. Video quality assessment
3. Knowledge check quizzes
4. Practice exercise validation
5. Closed caption accuracy

subtasks.title: Define Course Objectives and Target Audience
subtasks.description: Clarify the learning outcomes and identify the ideal learners for the course.
subtasks.details: Specify what students should achieve by the end of the course and describe the target demographic.

subtasks.title: Conduct Market and Learner Research
subtasks.description: Research market demand and learner needs to validate the course topic.
subtasks.details: Analyze competitor courses, gather feedback from potential learners, and identify gaps in existing offerings.

subtasks.title: Develop Detailed Course Outline
subtasks.description: Create a comprehensive outline covering all modules, lessons, and key topics.
subtasks.details: Break down the course into modules and lessons, ensuring logical progression and alignment with objectives.

subtasks.title: Plan Practice Activities and Assessments
subtasks.description: Design exercises, quizzes, and assessments for each module to reinforce learning.
subtasks.details: Determine the types of activities and assessments that best support each lesson’s objectives.

subtasks.title: Script and Storyboard Lessons
subtasks.description: Draft scripts and visual storyboards for each lesson to guide recording.
subtasks.details: Outline key talking points, demonstrations, and visual aids for each video.

subtasks.title: Set Up Recording Environment
subtasks.description: Prepare a professional recording setup for high-quality audio and video.
subtasks.details: Arrange lighting, camera, microphone, screen capture tools, and test all equipment.

subtasks.title: Record Course Modules
subtasks.description: Film or record all lessons, demonstrations, and walkthroughs for each module.
subtasks.details: Follow scripts and storyboards, ensuring clarity and engagement in delivery.

subtasks.title: Edit and Produce Video Content
subtasks.description: Edit raw footage, add graphics, captions, and transitions to create polished videos.
subtasks.details: Ensure consistency in branding, audio levels, and visual quality across all modules.

subtasks.title: Create Supplemental Resources
subtasks.description: Develop worksheets, templates, checklists, and reference materials for each module.
subtasks.details: Design resources that support lesson objectives and facilitate hands-on learning.

subtasks.title: Develop Knowledge Check Quizzes
subtasks.description: Build quizzes and self-assessment tools to measure learner progress after each module.
subtasks.details: Align questions with key concepts and provide instant feedback where possible.

subtasks.title: Integrate Practice Exercises
subtasks.description: Embed exercises and real-world tasks into each module for applied learning.
subtasks.details: Ensure exercises are actionable, relevant, and progressively challenging.

subtasks.title: Implement Closed Captions and Accessibility Features
subtasks.description: Add accurate closed captions and ensure all materials are accessible.
subtasks.details: Review captions for accuracy and provide alternative formats for all resources.

subtasks.title: Conduct Beta Testing with Sample Learners
subtasks.description: Invite a small group of users to test the course and provide feedback.
subtasks.details: Monitor learner engagement, collect feedback on clarity, pacing, and resource usefulness.

subtasks.title: Perform Quality Assurance Review
subtasks.description: Assess video, audio, resource quality, and learning effectiveness for each component.
subtasks.details: Check for technical issues, content accuracy, and alignment with objectives; revise as needed.

subtasks.title: Finalize and Publish Course
subtasks.description: Make final adjustments, upload all materials to the chosen platform, and launch the course.
subtasks.details: Ensure all modules, resources, and assessments are live and accessible to learners.

tasks.title: Develop UI Kit for n8n Integration
tasks.description: Create reusable React components specifically designed for n8n workflow integration using Shadcn UI and Tailwind
tasks.details:
1. Setup React/Next.js project template
2. Implement components:
   - Workflow status displays
   - Data visualization components
   - Webhook trigger buttons
   - Authentication forms
   - Dashboard layouts
3. Create documentation
4. Package for distribution
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Component unit testing
2. Integration testing with n8n
3. Performance testing
4. Documentation accuracy verification
5. Package installation testing

subtasks.title: Project Environment Setup
subtasks.description: Initialize the React/Next.js project with Shadcn UI and Tailwind CSS configured for n8n integration.
subtasks.details: Set up the project repository, install dependencies, configure Tailwind and Shadcn UI, and ensure the development environment is ready.

subtasks.title: Component Architecture Planning
subtasks.description: Define the structure, props, and state requirements for each UI component to be developed.
subtasks.details: Document the API and design for workflow status displays, data visualization, webhook buttons, authentication forms, and dashboard layouts.

subtasks.title: Implement Workflow Status Display Component
subtasks.description: Develop the reusable React component for displaying workflow statuses with n8n integration.
subtasks.details: Code the component, apply Tailwind styles, and ensure it supports dynamic status updates.

subtasks.title: Implement Data Visualization Components
subtasks.description: Create React components for visualizing workflow data, such as charts or tables.
subtasks.details: Develop components using appropriate charting libraries and ensure compatibility with n8n data formats.

subtasks.title: Implement Webhook Trigger Button Component
subtasks.description: Build a button component that triggers n8n webhooks and provides user feedback.
subtasks.details: Ensure the component handles API calls, loading states, and error handling.

subtasks.title: Implement Authentication Form Components
subtasks.description: Develop reusable authentication forms for login, registration, and password management.
subtasks.details: Integrate with n8n authentication endpoints and apply consistent UI patterns.

subtasks.title: Implement Dashboard Layout Components
subtasks.description: Create flexible dashboard layout components to organize and display workflow-related UI elements.
subtasks.details: Ensure layouts are responsive and support composition of other UI kit components.

subtasks.title: Component Unit and Integration Testing
subtasks.description: Write and execute unit and integration tests for all components, including n8n workflow integration.
subtasks.details: Use testing libraries to verify component behavior, edge cases, and integration with n8n APIs.

subtasks.title: Documentation Creation
subtasks.description: Document component usage, props, integration steps, and example implementations.
subtasks.details: Prepare comprehensive documentation for developers, including code samples and integration guides.

subtasks.title: Distribution Packaging and Verification
subtasks.description: Package the UI kit for distribution and verify installation and usage in a clean environment.
subtasks.details: Bundle components, generate type definitions, publish to a package registry, and test installation in a sample project.

tasks.title: Implement Lead Magnet Creation and Distribution
tasks.description: Develop free resources including Cursor rules starter kit and Brand Vibe Check workbook
tasks.details:
1. Create Cursor rules collection:
   - React/Next.js specific rules
   - Supabase integration rules
   - Testing automation rules
2. Design Brand Vibe Check workbook in Notion
3. Setup delivery automation
4. Create landing pages for each lead magnet
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test rules in various environments
2. Validate workbook exercises
3. Test delivery automation
4. User feedback collection
5. Conversion tracking setup

subtasks.title: Define Audience Pain Points and Lead Magnet Goals
subtasks.description: Identify the specific problems and needs of the target audience to ensure the lead magnet addresses relevant pain points and aligns with business objectives.
subtasks.details: Gather insights from sales, customer service, and analytics to pinpoint audience challenges and determine the primary goal for each lead magnet (e.g., list building, brand awareness).

subtasks.title: Develop Lead Magnet Content
subtasks.description: Create the actual content for each lead magnet, such as the Cursor rules starter kit and Brand Vibe Check workbook, ensuring it is valuable and actionable.
subtasks.details: Draft, design, and format the lead magnet materials using appropriate tools (e.g., Notion for workbooks, PDF export for distribution).

subtasks.title: Design Lead Magnet Assets
subtasks.description: Design visual and branding elements for the lead magnets, including covers, graphics, and layout, to ensure a professional and appealing presentation.
subtasks.details: Use design tools like Canva or Adobe to create visually engaging assets and finalize the lead magnet in a shareable format (e.g., PDF).

subtasks.title: Set Up Delivery Automation
subtasks.description: Configure automation workflows to deliver the lead magnet to users upon signup or request.
subtasks.details: Integrate with email marketing or CRM platforms to automate lead magnet delivery, including confirmation emails and download links.

subtasks.title: Develop Landing Pages
subtasks.description: Create dedicated landing pages for each lead magnet to capture user information and facilitate conversions.
subtasks.details: Design and build landing pages with clear messaging, forms, and calls-to-action using web development tools or landing page builders.

subtasks.title: Integrate Automation with Landing Pages
subtasks.description: Connect landing page forms to the delivery automation system to ensure seamless user experience and immediate access to the lead magnet.
subtasks.details: Test form submissions, email triggers, and download access to confirm end-to-end functionality.

subtasks.title: Implement Distribution System
subtasks.description: Set up and schedule distribution channels for promoting the lead magnets, such as email campaigns, social media, and website placements.
subtasks.details: Plan and execute promotional activities to drive traffic to the landing pages and maximize lead magnet reach.

subtasks.title: Test, Monitor, and Optimize
subtasks.description: Test the entire lead magnet funnel, monitor performance metrics, and optimize based on user feedback and analytics.
subtasks.details: Conduct A/B testing, track conversions, gather user feedback, and iterate on content, automation, and landing pages for improved results.

tasks.title: Setup Content Production Pipeline
tasks.description: Establish infrastructure for consistent content creation across YouTube, Twitter, and blog
tasks.details:
1. Create content calendar template
2. Setup recording studio for YouTube
3. Develop content templates:
   - YouTube script template
   - Twitter thread structure
   - Blog post format
4. Create thumbnail templates
5. Setup scheduling and automation tools
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Content workflow testing
2. Video production quality check
3. Social media scheduling verification
4. Analytics setup validation
5. Automation flow testing

subtasks.title: Define Content Types and Requirements
subtasks.description: Identify and document the specific requirements for YouTube videos, Twitter threads, and blog posts, including platform-specific guidelines and audience expectations.
subtasks.details: Gather input from stakeholders and research best practices for each platform to ensure all content types are clearly defined.

subtasks.title: Develop Content Calendar Template
subtasks.description: Create a master content calendar template to plan and track content production and publishing schedules across all platforms.
subtasks.details: Use tools like ClickUp or Google Sheets to design a calendar that includes deadlines, responsible team members, and platform-specific notes.

subtasks.title: Design Content Templates for Each Platform
subtasks.description: Develop standardized templates for YouTube scripts, Twitter threads, and blog post formats to ensure consistency and efficiency.
subtasks.details: Collaborate with content creators to iterate on template drafts and finalize versions that align with brand voice and platform requirements.

subtasks.title: Create Thumbnail and Visual Asset Templates
subtasks.description: Design reusable templates for YouTube thumbnails and blog post images to maintain visual consistency and speed up production.
subtasks.details: Use design tools like Canva or Adobe Photoshop to create templates that can be easily customized for each new piece of content.

subtasks.title: Configure Content Production Tools
subtasks.description: Set up and configure all necessary tools for content creation, collaboration, and scheduling, such as ClickUp, CMS, video editing software, and social media schedulers.
subtasks.details: Ensure integrations between tools are established for seamless workflow transitions and automation.

subtasks.title: Establish Content Workflow Processes
subtasks.description: Map out and document the step-by-step workflow for each content type, from ideation to publishing, including review and approval stages.
subtasks.details: Use workflow management features in tools like ClickUp to visualize and automate task progression.

subtasks.title: Set Up Scheduling and Automation Systems
subtasks.description: Implement scheduling and automation tools for publishing content on YouTube, Twitter, and the blog, ensuring posts go live at optimal times.
subtasks.details: Configure automation rules and test integrations with each platform to minimize manual intervention.

subtasks.title: Develop Testing Procedures for Each Content Type
subtasks.description: Create and document testing protocols for workflow validation, video production quality, social media scheduling, analytics setup, and automation flows.
subtasks.details: Define checklists and acceptance criteria for each testing area to ensure all aspects of the pipeline function as intended.

subtasks.title: Conduct End-to-End Pipeline Testing
subtasks.description: Run comprehensive tests of the entire content pipeline, simulating real content production and publishing scenarios for each platform.
subtasks.details: Identify and resolve any workflow bottlenecks, tool misconfigurations, or template issues discovered during testing.

subtasks.title: Finalize Documentation and Team Training
subtasks.description: Document all pipeline processes, templates, and tool configurations, and conduct training sessions for the content team to ensure smooth adoption.
subtasks.details: Provide reference guides and hold Q&A sessions to address any uncertainties about the new content production pipeline.

tasks.title: Develop Micro-SaaS Starter Kit
tasks.description: Create template for rapid SaaS deployment using React, Node.js, and Supabase stack
tasks.details:
1. Setup base architecture
2. Implement features:
   - Authentication system
   - Subscription management
   - Admin dashboard
   - User management
3. Create deployment scripts
4. Write documentation
tasks.testStrategy:
1. End-to-end testing
2. Security audit
3. Performance testing
4. Documentation review
5. Deployment testing on multiple platforms

subtasks.title: Define SaaS Architecture and Tenancy Model
subtasks.description: Select and document the overall SaaS architecture, including the tenancy model (single-tenant, multi-tenant, or hybrid) and core principles such as scalability, reliability, and availability.
subtasks.details: Consider business goals, scalability, and compliance requirements. Reference AWS Well-Architected Framework and Azure SaaS starter patterns.

subtasks.title: Set Up Project Structure and Base Stack
subtasks.description: Initialize the codebase with React (frontend), Node.js (backend), and Supabase (database/auth). Establish folder structure and development environment.
subtasks.details: Ensure modularity and extensibility for future features. Configure environment variables and basic tooling.

subtasks.title: Implement Authentication System
subtasks.description: Develop user authentication using Supabase Auth, supporting sign up, login, password reset, and email verification.
subtasks.details: Integrate with React frontend and Node.js backend. Ensure secure handling of credentials and session management.

subtasks.title: Develop User Management Module
subtasks.description: Create user profile management, role assignment, and user listing features for both users and admins.
subtasks.details: Support CRUD operations for user data and roles. Enforce access control based on roles.

subtasks.title: Build Subscription Management System
subtasks.description: Integrate payment provider (e.g., Stripe) for subscription plans, billing, and invoicing. Implement plan upgrades/downgrades and cancellation.
subtasks.details: Ensure secure payment processing and webhook handling. Store subscription status in Supabase.

subtasks.title: Create Admin Dashboard
subtasks.description: Develop an admin interface for managing users, subscriptions, and system settings.
subtasks.details: Include analytics, user activity logs, and subscription overviews. Restrict access to admin roles.

subtasks.title: Implement Tenant Onboarding Workflow
subtasks.description: Automate onboarding for new organizations or users, including welcome emails and initial setup steps.
subtasks.details: Support both manual and self-service onboarding. Track onboarding progress in the database.

subtasks.title: Set Up API Layer and Documentation
subtasks.description: Develop RESTful or GraphQL APIs for all core features and generate API documentation.
subtasks.details: Use OpenAPI/Swagger for REST or GraphQL schema documentation. Ensure endpoints are secure and versioned.

subtasks.title: Integrate Security Best Practices
subtasks.description: Apply security measures such as input validation, rate limiting, CSRF/XSS protection, and secure storage of secrets.
subtasks.details: Conduct code reviews and use automated security scanning tools. Follow OWASP guidelines.

subtasks.title: Implement Multi-Tenancy Data Isolation
subtasks.description: Ensure proper data isolation between tenants using row-level security or schema separation in Supabase.
subtasks.details: Document the chosen isolation strategy and test for data leaks between tenants.

subtasks.title: Set Up Automated Testing Framework
subtasks.description: Configure end-to-end, integration, and unit testing for frontend, backend, and APIs.
subtasks.details: Use tools like Jest, Cypress, or Playwright. Include test coverage reporting.

subtasks.title: Develop Deployment Scripts and CI/CD Pipeline
subtasks.description: Create scripts and workflows for automated deployment to cloud platforms (e.g., Vercel, AWS, Azure).
subtasks.details: Set up CI/CD for build, test, and deploy stages. Support environment configuration for staging and production.

subtasks.title: Configure Monitoring and Logging
subtasks.description: Integrate monitoring (e.g., health checks, uptime) and centralized logging for all services.
subtasks.details: Use tools like LogRocket, Sentry, or cloud-native solutions. Set up alerts for critical failures.

subtasks.title: Write Developer and User Documentation
subtasks.description: Document architecture, setup instructions, API usage, and feature guides for both developers and end users.
subtasks.details: Include onboarding guides, troubleshooting, and contribution guidelines. Use Markdown or a documentation generator.

subtasks.title: Conduct Security Audit and Final QA
subtasks.description: Perform a comprehensive security review, penetration testing, and final quality assurance before release.
subtasks.details: Address any vulnerabilities or critical bugs found. Prepare release notes and deployment checklist.

tasks.title: Create Vibe Marketing Launchpad Course Outline
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive curriculum for authentic marketing and brand building course
tasks.details:
1. Create module structure
2. Develop lesson plans
3. Create worksheets and templates
4. Design exercises and assignments
5. Create assessment criteria
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Peer review of curriculum
2. Beta tester feedback
3. Learning outcome validation
4. Content completeness check
5. Exercise effectiveness testing

subtasks.title: Define Course Goals and Outcomes
subtasks.description: Establish the overall goals for the course, identify desired learner transformations, and determine key learning outcomes and summative assessments.
subtasks.details: Clarify what students should achieve by the end of the course and how success will be measured.

subtasks.title: Plan Module Structure
subtasks.description: Break down the course into logical modules or units, ensuring a clear progression of topics aligned with the course outcomes.
subtasks.details: Draft module titles, sequence, and objectives for each module to provide a roadmap for content development.

subtasks.title: Develop Lesson Plans and Content Structure
subtasks.description: Outline the content for each module, including lesson topics, learning objectives, and instructional methods.
subtasks.details: Specify the flow of information, key concepts, and how each lesson supports module and course outcomes.

subtasks.title: Identify and Create Learning Resources
subtasks.description: List and develop all materials and resources needed for the course, such as readings, videos, guides, and external tools.
subtasks.details: Ensure resources reinforce course content and are accessible to all students.

subtasks.title: Design Assessments and Activities
subtasks.description: Create quizzes, assignments, projects, and other assessments that align with learning objectives and provide measurable outcomes.
subtasks.details: Include formative and summative assessments, and specify grading criteria.

subtasks.title: Build Course in Learning Management System (LMS)
subtasks.description: Integrate modules, content, resources, and assessments into the LMS, ensuring logical navigation and accessibility.
subtasks.details: Apply consistent design and branding, and organize materials for easy student access.

subtasks.title: Conduct Peer Review and Validation
subtasks.description: Have instructional designers or subject matter experts review the course outline, content, and assessments for accuracy, alignment, and completeness.
subtasks.details: Collect feedback and make necessary revisions to improve course quality.

subtasks.title: Pilot Test and Finalize Course
subtasks.description: Run a beta test with a sample of learners to validate learning outcomes, resource effectiveness, and overall course structure.
subtasks.details: Gather feedback, address issues, and finalize the course for launch.

tasks.title: Implement Analytics and Tracking System
tasks.description: Setup comprehensive analytics for tracking success metrics across all platforms
tasks.details:
1. Setup tracking for:
   - Community metrics
   - Course completions
   - Revenue tracking
   - Content performance
   - Lead magnet conversions
2. Create dashboards
3. Setup automated reporting
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Data accuracy verification
2. Dashboard functionality testing
3. Report generation testing
4. Real-time tracking validation
5. Integration testing

subtasks.title: Define Analytics Objectives and KPIs
subtasks.description: Identify and document the business goals, success metrics, and key performance indicators (KPIs) for community metrics, course completions, revenue, content performance, and lead magnet conversions.
subtasks.details: Consult stakeholders to ensure all relevant metrics are captured and aligned with business objectives.

subtasks.title: Develop a Comprehensive Tracking Plan
subtasks.description: Create a detailed tracking plan that maps each objective and KPI to specific events, user actions, and data points to be tracked.
subtasks.details: Document the plan in a spreadsheet or tracking plan template, specifying event names, properties, and trigger conditions.

subtasks.title: Select and Configure Analytics Platforms
subtasks.description: Choose the analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics 4, Piwik PRO, or others) and configure accounts, properties, and data streams for all platforms to be tracked.
subtasks.details: Ensure proper account structure for multiple sites or apps as needed.

subtasks.title: Install Tracking Codes and Tags
subtasks.description: Implement the analytics tracking codes or tags on all relevant web and app properties using direct code placement or a tag manager (e.g., Google Tag Manager).
subtasks.details: Verify that tags are firing correctly and data is being sent to the analytics platform.

subtasks.title: Set Up Event and Conversion Tracking
subtasks.description: Configure event tracking for key user actions such as community engagement, course completions, revenue transactions, content interactions, and lead magnet downloads.
subtasks.details: Define custom events and conversions in the analytics platform as specified in the tracking plan.

subtasks.title: Integrate Third-Party and External Tools
subtasks.description: Connect analytics with other platforms (e.g., Google Ads, Search Console, CRM, email marketing) for comprehensive data collection and attribution.
subtasks.details: Ensure data flows correctly between systems and supports cross-platform reporting.

subtasks.title: Create Analytics Dashboards
subtasks.description: Design and build dashboards that visualize key metrics and KPIs for stakeholders, using the analytics platform’s dashboard tools or external BI solutions.
subtasks.details: Include visualizations for community metrics, course completions, revenue, content performance, and lead magnet conversions.

subtasks.title: Configure Automated Reporting
subtasks.description: Set up automated report generation and distribution for key stakeholders, scheduling regular email or in-platform reports.
subtasks.details: Ensure reports are tailored to audience needs and include actionable insights.

subtasks.title: Validate Data Accuracy
subtasks.description: Perform data accuracy checks by comparing tracked data against known benchmarks, manual tests, or backend data sources.
subtasks.details: Identify and resolve discrepancies to ensure reliable analytics.

subtasks.title: Test Dashboard Functionality
subtasks.description: Verify that dashboards display correct data, update in real time or as scheduled, and provide expected interactivity and filtering.
subtasks.details: Conduct user acceptance testing with stakeholders.

subtasks.title: Test Automated Report Generation
subtasks.description: Ensure automated reports are generated and delivered as scheduled, with accurate and up-to-date data.
subtasks.details: Test report formatting, content, and delivery to all intended recipients.

subtasks.title: Conduct End-to-End Integration and Real-Time Tracking Validation
subtasks.description: Perform comprehensive integration testing to confirm that all tracking, dashboards, and reporting work seamlessly across platforms and in real time.
subtasks.details: Simulate user actions and verify data flow from event capture to dashboard and report output.

tasks.title: Develop Founding Members Program
tasks.description: Create and launch exclusive founding members program with lifetime access deal
tasks.details:
1. Define program benefits
2. Setup pricing structure
3. Create marketing materials
4. Implement tracking system
5. Setup member communication flow
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Payment processing testing
2. Access provision verification
3. Communication flow testing
4. Member portal testing
5. Benefits delivery validation

subtasks.title: Assemble Implementation Team
subtasks.description: Form a cross-functional team including creative, customer-focused staff and stakeholders who understand member needs.
subtasks.details: Select team members who can dedicate time to the program and represent diverse perspectives for effective implementation.

subtasks.title: Define Program Vision and Objectives
subtasks.description: Establish a clear vision, objectives, and success metrics for the founding members program.
subtasks.details: Create a program charter outlining scope, goals, key stakeholders, and how success will be measured.

subtasks.title: Develop Member Benefit Package
subtasks.description: Identify and document the exclusive benefits to be offered to founding members.
subtasks.details: List all tangible and intangible benefits, such as lifetime access, special recognition, early feature access, or community perks.

subtasks.title: Establish Pricing Structure
subtasks.description: Determine the pricing tiers and payment options for the founding members program.
subtasks.details: Analyze market benchmarks and perceived value to set competitive and attractive pricing for early adopters.

subtasks.title: Create Marketing Materials
subtasks.description: Develop compelling marketing assets to promote the founding members program.
subtasks.details: Prepare landing page content, email campaigns, social media posts, and visual assets highlighting benefits and urgency.

subtasks.title: Set Up Member Management System
subtasks.description: Implement a system to track, manage, and communicate with founding members.
subtasks.details: Configure CRM or membership software to handle sign-ups, payments, benefit delivery, and ongoing engagement.

subtasks.title: Develop Member Communication Flow
subtasks.description: Design and automate onboarding and ongoing communication sequences for founding members.
subtasks.details: Map out welcome emails, benefit delivery notifications, and regular updates to maintain engagement.

subtasks.title: Test Payment Processing and Access Provision
subtasks.description: Verify that payment systems and access controls work seamlessly for new founding members.
subtasks.details: Run test transactions and ensure members receive correct access and benefits upon joining.

subtasks.title: Launch Founding Members Program
subtasks.description: Officially open enrollment and begin marketing the program to target audiences.
subtasks.details: Coordinate launch timing across channels and monitor initial sign-ups and feedback.

subtasks.title: Monitor, Support, and Iterate
subtasks.description: Track program performance, gather member feedback, and refine benefits or processes as needed.
subtasks.details: Regularly review metrics, address member inquiries, and make improvements to maximize satisfaction and retention.
